thread.title: Longtime Detroit landlord Chuck Costa dies at 80

title: Longtime Detroit landlord Chuck Costa dies at 80
text:
Published By: Detroit Free Press - Today 
He was 80. He had been battling illness for years, and suffered from respiratory issues related to smoking, said his daughter-in-law, Tanya ...
